mbean.name: jboss:type=Service,name=PinbalProperties
mbean.attribute:
caib-crypto-keystore=/opt/webapps/keystores/caib_certs.jks caib-crypto-keystore-password=1234
es.caib.pinbal.datasource.jndi=java:es.caib.pinbal.db es.caib.pinbal.hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle9iDialect es.caib.pinbal.hibernate.show_sql=false es.caib.pinbal.hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto=none
es.caib.pinbal.xsd.base.path=/opt/webapps/pinbal/xsd es.caib.pinbal.recobriment.base.url=http://localhost:8180/pinbalrec
es.caib.pinbal.plugin.dades.usuari.jdbc.datasource.jndi.name=java:es.caib.pinbal.usuaris.db es.caib.pinbal.plugin.signatura.caib.certificat.alias=TEST: TEST CAIB - certificado 12345678Z es.caib.pinbal.plugin.signatura.caib.certificat.password=1234 es.caib.pinbal.plugin.custodia.caib.url=https://proves.caib.es/signatura/services/CustodiaDocumentos es.caib.pinbal.plugin.custodia.caib.username=HELIUM es.caib.pinbal.plugin.custodia.caib.password=HELIUMABC es.caib.pinbal.plugin.firmaservidor.portafib.plugins.signatureserver.portafib.api_passarela_url=https://proves.caib.es/portafib/ws/v1/PortaFIBPassarelaDeFirmaEnServidor es.caib.pinbal.plugin.firmaservidor.portafib.plugins.signatureserver.portafib.api_passarela_username=$helium_portafibpass es.caib.pinbal.plugin.firmaservidor.portafib.plugins.signatureserver.portafib.api_passarela_password=helium_portafibpass es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.base.url=https://afirmades.caib.es:4430/esb es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.usuari=app1 es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.contrasenya=app1 es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.url=https://dev.caib.es/concsv/rest/printable/uuid es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.usuari=$concsv_ripea es.caib.pinbal.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.contrasenya=concsv_ripea es.caib.pinbal.plugin.unitats.organitzatives.dir3.service.url=http://dev.caib.es/dir3caib es.caib.pinbal.plugin.unitats.organitzatives.dir3.service.username=$ripea_dir3caib es.caib.pinbal.plugin.unitats.organitzatives.dir3.service.password=ripea_dir3caib es.caib.pinbal.plugin.unitats.cerca.dir3.service.url=https://dev.caib.es/dir3caib/rest/busqueda/organismos
es.caib.pinbal.scsp.almacenamiento.ficheros=/opt/webapps/pinbal/scsp/ficheros es.caib.pinbal.scsp.keystoreFile=file:/opt/webapps/keystores/interoperabilitat.jks es.caib.pinbal.scsp.keystorePass=tecnologies
es.caib.pinbal.email.jndi=java:es.caib.pinbal.mail es.caib.pinbal.email.remitent=proves_limit@limit.es es.caib.pinbal.email.footer=PINBAL - Govern de les Illes Balears es.caib.pinbal.tasca.auto.email.report.estat.cron=0 0 22 * * *
